{"id":1005918449,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1690525903,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1005918449/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reformat The String","memory":"7.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string reformat(string s) {\n        vector<char> s_v, d_v;\n\n        for (auto i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {\n            if (isalpha(s[i]))\n                s_v.push_back(s[i]);\n            else if (isdigit(s[i]))\n                d_v.push_back(s[i]);\n            else\n                return \"\";\n        }\n\n        if (abs((int)(s_v.size() - d_v.size())) > 1)\n            return \"\";\n\n        bool is_alpha_first = s_v.size() > d_v.size();\n        int i = 0, itr_s = 0, itr_d = 0;\n        while (i < s.length()) {\n            if (is_alpha_first)\n                s[i++] = s_v[itr_s++];\n            else\n                s[i++] = d_v[itr_d++];\n            is_alpha_first = !is_alpha_first;\n        }\n        return s;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reformat-the-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
